title: I'm so upset about Riot's balancing decisions
body:
Instead of focusing on all those toxic, problematic champions like Fizz, Akali, Zed, Katarina, etc. Riot nerfs the support champions that are specifically used to counter those toxic champions. I'm talking about Janna.

She's very strong at protecting your carries against assassins, but she gets a huge nerf before all those other toxic assassins get their rightfully deserved nerfs. You know how much of a big difference 180 width and 150 width is? Pretty big. If you don't land your tornado on spot, you're dead, and Janna is already a very difficult champion to play. If your anti-assassin champion gets the nerf bat, guess what? The assassins become even stronger.

And on top of that, Sona gets a nerf as well, even though the consensus is that she's a weak support who is outclassed almost completely by Nami.

Poor Sona and Janna. RIP my sweethearts.

Dude, sona is overpowered.  Get over it.

She has everything a ranged support could possibly want.  She has auras, heals, shields and high damage from pretty far range.


She is oppressive as shit in lane.

Like Fizz/Zed oppressive?  :P

I dunno I'd almost always rather go up against a Sona than a Thresh.  At least she can't hit the adc with one skillshot and end the laning phase.  A good Sona definitely makes laning just about pointless as soon as they get ahead, but in many matchups Thresh does that already just by being Thresh(as long as he doesn't whiff hooks all day).

You can dodge the hook.

You cannot dodge the sona auto clicks.

if She's autoing you for free your doing it wrong. Or your adc is.

Right?  I mean come on, punish Sona for utilizing her poorly designed kit.  She has average range, is in the top 5 squishiest champs and tied for lowest base damage amongst supports.  Her max damage potential in a single trade is the 2nd lowest only to Braum.  She's not "bursting" anyone down, people are complaining because they **let **her whittle them down by means of **attrition**.  Fight back, her healing and shield are the worst and most expensive in the game, just 1 solid retaliation makes her instantly go OoM trying to sustain back up.
There is a technique to it, you know. Or you can just use your [W] to reduce the damage and heal back whatever damage they dealt.
You can dodge hooks, sure, but can you dodge every single one?  Cause it only takes one hit and thats it.
If Fizz is oppressive in lane then you're doing something wrong.
